mita amatharawa natya pilibandawa pasal mattamin sammanthrana pawathwima, siyaluma wishwawidyalawala natya ulela sanwidhanaya kirima, maname natakaya demala basata pariwarthanaya kota ranga gatha kirima ha natya uthsawa pawathwimada wasarak pura sidu kere.ee wenuwen janma shatha samarum kamituwak path kirimata janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha sanskruthika ha kala katayuthu amathi ti.bi.eekanayaka mahathata upades laba di thibe.neboda(22) araliyagaha mandiraye di janadhipathiwaraya ge pradhanathwayen pawathi sakachchawaka di mahacharya ediriwira sarachchandrayange nirmana saha jiwana thorathuru athulath web adawiyak da wiwrutha kerunu athara, sanskruthika ha kala katayuthu pilibanda amathi ti.bi. eekanayaka, amathi bandula gunawardhana, janadhipathi lekam lalith wirathunga, lalith sarachchandra mahathmiya, sarachchandra padaname sabhapathi mahacharya kalo fonseka, mahacharyawarun wana je.bi. disanayaka, ke.en.oo. dharmadasa, janamadhya amathyanshaye lekam charitha herath, rajaye prawruththi departhamenthuwe adhyaksha jenaral aariyarathna athugala, yunesko jathika komishan sabhawe lekam prithi wiraja perera yana mahathwaruda me awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha..
